text: Marcus Vinicius Carvalho Lopes D'Almeida is an archer from Brazil. D'Almeida competed at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics, the 2016 Summer Olympics, and the 2020 Summer Olympics. He was born on 30 January 1998.Marcus Dâ€™Almeida == References == Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian archers Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Marcus Vinicius D'Almeida
